resources.string: For your (and everyone\'s) security, we require every person entering the college to fill out the form at least the day before.\nYou will be able to generate your secure QR code, showing it to the security office will grant you access tot he college building.\nWith this information we will be able to notify the right people in the case of a Covid case
Also, we\'ll make loads of cash with your data
Every field is required, please fill them before generating your QR code
